title: Smart Home Installation
details: We provide full smart home installation including smart lighting, CCTV setup, door lock automation, and mobile app integration.

title: Home Decoration (Small Event)
details: Small event decoration including theme setup, flowers, basic lighting, balloons, and backdrop design.

title: Ceremony Decoration (Premium)
details: Premium wedding and ceremony decoration including stage setup, floral design, lighting, and full event management.
